details.name: Dry Time
details.info:
Touch: 2-4 hours
Recoat: 12 hours
*Measured at 25°C and 50% relative humidity

details.name: Theoretical Coverage
details.info:
25-30 sq. m.
*Depending on surface texture and porosity
* per 4-Liters at 2.5-2.0 DFT

details.name: Thinning Solvent
details.info: Thin with not more than 1-Liter of BOYSEN®® Paint Thinner B‑0340 per 4-Liter can of BOYSEN®® alkyd enamel products.
